name: Poached Eggs
method: bring a saucepan of water to a light simmer,crack the egg into a container,drop the egg using the container into simmering water,placed a lid over the saucepan and leave the water simmer and poach the egg for 3/4 minutes,remove the egg from the water with a slotted spoon and plate!

name: Toast
method: put bread into a toaster, toast, takeout, spread butter on toast and plate!

name: Toast
method: put bread into a toaster, toast, takeout, spread butter on toast and plate!
